properties.ApplicationDefaultFont: Customizes the application default font. The format equivalent to the output of FontConverter.ConvertToInvariantString(). Applies only to Windows Forms projects.

ApplicationHighDpiMode.description: Customizes the application DPI awareness mode. Applies only to Windows Forms projects.

ApplicationUseCompatibleTextRendering.description: Indicates whether to set UseCompatibleTextRendering property defined on certain controls (boolean). Applies only to Windows Forms projects.

ApplicationVisualStyles.description: Indicates whether to enable or disable visual styles (boolean). Applies only to Windows Forms projects.

EnableDefaultPageItems.description: Whether to include XAML page files in the project directory by wildcard

EnableDefaultApplicationDefinition.description: Whether to include XAML application files in the project directory by wildcard
